document.full_text: greece must avoid debt restructuring and push on with budget cuts and privatisations to overcome its debt crisis, the country's prime minister george papandreou and senior ecb officials said on saturday.
document.title: greek pm, ecb officials reject debt restructuring
lines_and_colors: greece must avoid debt restructuring and push on with budget cuts and privatisations to overcome its debt crisis, the country's prime minister george papandreou and senior ecb officials said on saturday.
